/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -g    -shared -Wl,-soname,libvpc.so -o ../lib/libvpc.so CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/vpc_base.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/htrki.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/vpc_bundle.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/sampling.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/direct.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vpc.dir/autocalib.cxx.o /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_contrib.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gpu.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_legacy.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_nonfree.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ts.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videostab.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
